## Colorado

```{r echo = F}
xF_01 <- "05colorado/"
xN_01 <- list.files(xF_01)
xL_01 <- paste0(xF_01, xN_01)
xC_01 <- paste("Image", 
                str_pad(1:(length(xN_01)), width = 3, pad = "0"),
                "-", xN_01)
pixgallery(path = xL_01, caption = xC_01, layout = "masonry")
```
